text: "Innocent Man (Misunderstood)" is a song by American hip hop recording artist Cassidy. It was officially released on December 22, 2007 and serves as the second single from his third studio album, B.A.R.S. The Barry Adrian Reese Story (2007). The song, which was produced by Cassidy's longtime mentor and frequent collaborator Swizz Beatz, features vocals from English R&B; singer Mark Morrison, sampling his song "Innocent Man". ==Background== In an interview with FMQB Radio, Cassidy gave insight on the song: == Charts == {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2007) !Peak position |- |US Bubbling Under Hot 100 Singles (Billboard) |align="center"|3[ Bubbling Under R&B;/Hip-Hop Singles-Innocent (Misunderstood)] |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2007 singles Category:Cassidy (rapper) songs Category:Mark Morrison songs Category:Song recordings produced by Swizz Beatz Category:Songs written by Swizz Beatz Category:Songs written by Mark Morrison Category:2007 songs
title: Innocent Man (Misunderstood)
